textBeforeTable: Cruise Itinerary Reviews Deck Plans Entertainment Dining Staterooms Itinerary Photo Gallery (1,017 reviews) / 5  3.6 View more Ports of Call: Seattle, Washington Departing from: Norwegian Pearl There are no cruises available for the requested dates. We're sorry.
textAfterTable: Click Image to Enlarge Highlights: Excellent onboard entertainment from evening shows to comedy, pool games, bingo, bowling and dancing. 12 unique restaurants to choose from including Asian dishes at Lotus Garden, French at Le Bistro and juicy steaks at Cagney's. This giant floating resort features swimming pools, hot tubs, a health club, casino and tons of things to do. Past guest rave about the numerous dining options, fun activities and engaging staff members. Your Package Includes: Your package includes shipboard accommodations, ocean transportation, fabulous entertainment and daily activities, on-board meals and some beverages. It does not include shore excursions, personal expenses, or alcoholic beverages. Government fees and taxes are not included.
